actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.
Mr. Rahall moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 5137.
On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands

official_title: To ensure that hunting remains a purpose of the New River Gorge National River.

summary.text: Amends the National Parks and Recreation Act of 1978 to require (current law authorizes) the Secretary of the Interior to: (1) permit hunting and fishing on lands and waters within the boundaries of the New River Gorge National River; and (2) designate zones where, and establish periods when, no hunting or fishing shall be permitted.

titles.title: To ensure that hunting remains a purpose of the New River Gorge National River.
